title: mc错误日志
author: lwj08
txt_content:
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x4df0b6ed, pid=2472, tid=3336
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_91-b14) (build 1.8.0_91-b14)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.91-b14 mixed mode windows-x86 )
# Problematic frame:
# C  [iglicd32.dll+0xeb6ed]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 更新显卡驱动试试，或者关闭硬件加速。

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
lwj08 发表于 2016-7-9 15:05
是关闭dxdiag的硬件加速吗
不太像。在这里。http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/454316aba6694df7a7c03aa8.html

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content: iglicd32.dll貌似是显卡问题，更新显卡驱动/切换显卡

replies.author: lwj08
replies.txt_content: 显卡驱动已经最新，没别的显卡了

replies.txt_content:
lwj08 发表于 2016-7-9 15:24

你真没有独显？没的话，那就只有……再买一个显卡了……

replies.txt_content: 但是我原来并不会出现这样的问题呀

replies.author: lwj08
replies.txt_content:
换了JAVA7还是不行，但是我觉得这句话特别重要
Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content:
lwj08 发表于 2016-7-9 15:37
换了JAVA7还是不行，但是我觉得这句话特别重要
Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by  ...
这句话的话，是说的你关闭了记录错误日志的功能，所以无法记录错误日志到系统里。
如果你是Win8以及以上的系统，Intel官方是没有提供对应系统的显卡驱动的，所以会导致一部分人无法使用这几个系统玩mc（至于比如驱动精灵里能下载到这个驱动，我不知道他是从哪儿弄来的，不过肯定是无法玩mc的）
